task.title: Creating dataset calculated attribute or association

prereq.p: The following steps assume that you have a domain model file in your project containing the dataset you want to extend. This task describe the creation of either calculated attribute and calculated association.

step.cmd: In the DS Navigator view pane, double-click the domain model file that you want to work with.
step.stepresult: The file and its elements are displayed in the Editor area.

step.cmd: In the Editor area, right-click a dataset and select New Calculated Attribute .
Go to the Properties view pane, located below the Editor area, and complete the fields to edit the calculated attribute's or association's properties.
